Which of the following is the matrix $\mat{A}$ generated by

```{r, eval = FALSE}
A <- t(matrix(c(rep(1,times=2),rep(3,times=2), 6, 4),ncol=3))
```

(a) $\quad \mathbb{A} = \begin{bmatrix} 1 &  1 \\  3 &  3 \\ 6 & 4 \end{bmatrix}$

(a) $\quad \mathbb{A} = \begin{bmatrix} 1 &  3 & 6 \\  1 &  3 & 4 \end{bmatrix}$

(a) $\quad \mathbb{A} = \begin{bmatrix} 1 &  3 \\  1 &  6 \\ 1 & 3 \end{bmatrix}$

(a) $\quad \mathbb{A} = \begin{bmatrix} 1 &  1 & 3 \\  3 &  6 & 4 \end{bmatrix}$
